criteriaItems.value: 4-6 months,6 months - 2 years,2-5 years,5-7 years,7-10 years,greater than 10 yrs
4-6 months,6 months - 1 year,1 year - 2 years,2-5 years,5-7 years,7-10 years,greater than 10 yrs

rules.fullName: Adult Cat and Dog Auto-tasks %288 years%29

criteriaItems.value: 4-6 months,6 months - 1 year,1 year - 2 years,2-5 years,5-7 years,7-10 years,greater than 10 yrs

rules.description: Notifies Behavior team if Forensic Hold Status or Charge Animal fields have been updated.
rules.formula: AND( Case_Record_Type__c = "National Criminal Case",OR(ISCHANGED(Forensic_Status__c), ISCHANGED( Charge_Animal__c)))

rules.description: This rule is run whenever "Current Behavior Grade" is changed from a blank value to any of the available dropdown values.
This rule is run whenever "Current Behavior Grade" is altered, after the initial change.
When Animal is euthanized, cancel tasks

tasks.description:
Create series of daily weights for through two weeks of age. (Days 1-14).
Use the following comment: Record weight in grams or kgs, compare to birth weight. If puppy has not gained 10% of birthweight – report to medical lead immediately.
tasks.subject: Daily Weight Task Creation Reminder

tasks.description:
Create series of EOD weights for through four weeks of age. (Days 16-28).
Use the following comment: Record weight in grams or kgs, compare to birth weight. If puppy has not gained 10% of birthweight – report to medical lead immediately.
tasks.subject: EOD Weight Task Creation Reminder

tasks.description: You just changed the kennel location of this animal. If you haven’t done so already, please add a note in Salesforce with the reason for the move. Then, create a recurring task for the next week to check on the animal and address any issues or concerns.
tasks.subject: Kennel Change Follow-up
